1.12.2.1.3.0:
Indicatia 1.3.0 Change Log
+ Added Ping Mode 
+ Re-added smooth sneaking view 
* Required SteveKunG's Lib 1.1.3 
* Update minigames and optimization 
* Improve AFK Movement 
* Resetting config is now work in-game without restart 
* Minor change to Old Fishing Rod rendering 
* Minor improvement to render health status 
* More improvement to Right Click to Add Party 
* More fixes to Player Tab Overlay (latency display) 
* Fixed button id conflict with Creative Tabs 
* Fixed Hotbar rendering when disable boss bar 
* Fixed string width issue in Player List overlay
1.12.2.1.2.6:
Indicatia 1.2.6 Change Log
* Using Mixin Framework, please check if it incompatible with other mods. 
* Update Forge version 
* More compatibility with other mods.

* Update Minigames JSON

* Now Required SteveKunG's Lib 1.0.5

1.12.2.1.2.0:

+ Added New Extended Config GUI 
+ Added /autofish command

+ Added mouse scroll support for Hypixel Minigame list

* Custom Cape now save per user

* Fixed Toggle Sprint key binding issue. Closes #1
